alert.note: Alert for Manua; Swains Island; Tutuila and Aunuu (American Samoa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS American Samoa (Pago Pago, American Samoa)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued August 02 at 8:43PM SST by NWS American Samoa
info.description: ...Wind Advisory remains in effect... * Strong winds of 25 to 35 mph, with higher gusts, will continue to impact the islands. * TIMING...through Thursday * IMPACTS...Expect possible downed tree limbs as well as shifting of loose and unsecured small objects due to strong winds. Gusty winds will make driving difficult and may cause hazardous conditions for mariners. FAUTUAGA MO SAVILI MALOLOSI OFISA O LE TAU PAGO PAGO AS 843 TAEAO ASO LULU AUKUSO 3 2022 ...O loo faaauau Fautuaga mo Savili Malolosi... * O savili malolosi e 25 i le 35 mph ma e agi faatautau o le a aafia ai motu uma o Amerika Samoa i le po nanei. * TAIMI...seia oo i le Aso Tofi * AAFIAGA...E pauu laau, e lelea mea-totino e le`i faamaumauina ma e faaleagaina foi apa ma taualuga o fale. O savili malolosi e mafai ona faafaigata ai le faafoeina o taavale, ae maise lava taavale maualuluga. E sousou foi le sami ona o le malolosi o savili. FAUTUAGA/TAPENAGA... O fautuaga mo savili malolosi, o lona uiga o savili e 29 i le 38 mph ma e agi fa`ata`uta`u e oo atu i le 40 mph, o loo aafia le atunu`u, ae maise lava nofoaga maualuluga. O nei savili malolosi o le a faafaigata ai ona faafoe taavale i luga o le auala tele, ae maise lava taavale tetele ma le maualuluga. Fa`amolemole ia fa`autagia mai lenei fautuaga.
info.instruction: A wind advisory means that sustained winds 29 to 38 mph and/or gusts to 57 mph are expected. Winds this strong can make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Please use extra caution.

area.areaDesc: Manua; Swains Island; Tutuila and Aunuu
